<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">《心经》，全名《般若心经》，</font><font color="#24292f">是佛教经典中极为重要的一部经文，广泛流传于东亚地区。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">这部经文以其简洁而深邃的智慧，吸引了无数信徒与研究者。</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><br>
